Assess & Mitigate your Ransomware Risk With Qualys at No Cost For 60 Days

LIVE WEBINAR: Thursday, October 21 | 10:00 AM PT

Dear ,


With ransomware attacks increasing & getting more sophisticated, authorities like CISA & NIST recommend that organizations strengthen their defense by proactively assessing the ransomware risk and taking actions at scale to protect their business.


To help organizations combat risks from ransomware attacks, Qualys is offering a 60-day no-cost service to provide clear and actionable insights into your organization's ransomware exposure, along with automated remediation plan to reduce the risk of attacks.


These insights are driven by research experts who have curated ransomware-specific information of risky software, vulnerabilities, misconfigurations, and their exploitation.


Qualys Ransomware Risk Assessment Service enables you to
Get a unified view into critical ransomware exposures such as internet-facing vulnerabilities and misconfigurations, insecure remote desktop gateways (RDP), as well as detection of risky software and assets missing anti-malware solutions.
Accelerate remediation of Ransomware exposure with zero-touch patching helping you reduce the attack surface.
Stay ahead of the Ransomware attacks by focusing on prevention and help minimizing potential financial loss and brand damages from attacks.

Join us on October 21 at 10 AM PT to see new Ransomware Risk Assessment service in action, presented & demonstrated by Ramesh Ramchandran, Principal Product Manager for VMDR at Qualys.


Sincerely,
The Qualys Team
